dt: {bc}to include or place within something larger or more comprehensive {bc}encompass as a subordinate or component element

dt.t: red, green, and yellow are {it}subsumed{/it} under the term "color"

et: New Latin {it}subsumere{/it}, from Latin {it}sub-{/it} + {it}sumere{/it} to take up {ma}{mat|consume|}{/ma}
shortdef: to include or place within something larger or more comprehensive : encompass as a subordinate or component element
